# xelon_load_balancer (Data Source)

The load balancer data source provides information about an existing Xelon load balancer.

Load balancers distribute network traffic across multiple devices for high availability and scalability.

## Example Usage

### Using name

```terraform
data "xelon_load_balancer" "web" {
  name = "production-lb"
}
```

### Using ID

```terraform
data "xelon_load_balancer" "web" {
  id = "lb-12345"
}
```

### Using ID and name for validation

```terraform
data "xelon_load_balancer" "web" {
  id   = "lb-12345"
  name = "production-lb"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the load balancer.
- `name` (String) The load balancer name.

### Read-Only

- `cloud_id` (String) The cloud ID where the load balancer is deployed.
- `tenant_id` (String) The tenant ID that owns the load balancer.
- `internal_ipv4_address` (String) The internal IPv4 address.
- `external_ipv4_address` (String) The external IPv4 address.
